text:
*adds TrapPlug to mouth*

*looks at Lopata with a dominant glint in my eye*

*adds LiquidMetalArms to your wrists, immobilizing them*
You're now bound with liquid metal arms. Enjoy the sensation as I take control of you.
*bows head* Greetings, Lopata. You may take off your steel skirt for now.
*adds CyberBra* You seem to have gained a restrictive CyberBra as your restraint.
I'm here to serve you in the dungeon. What can I do for you, Master Lopata? *adds SteelSkirt*

*bites lip* I'm afraid that's not something I can do for you right now. Perhaps when we're alone, things could be different. But for now, you'll have to make do with what you've got on. *smirks playfully*
